error_alert_text: Something went wrong! Please try again.
token_expired_alert_text: Please log in again to continue.
page_not_found_text: The page you're looking can not be found.
name: Name
confirm_action: Are you sure to perform this action?
operation_failed: Operation failed, please try again later
turkey_based_bitcoin_exchange_platform: Estonia Based leading Bitcoin exchange platform.
secure_exchange_body: Exbita is build for you to exchange your crypto currencies easily. You can easily buy, sell or exchange your crypto-currencies with our Estonia based system. Even though it is quite easy to use our system, you can contact us whenever you want and ask your question. Make your investments from Exbita, the best and the most secure way for you and for your business.
not_only_bitcoin_body: You can exchange not only Bitcoin but many crypto currencies in the market from Exbita. You can see instant values and movements of these funds from our site and you can also ask us for help with these crypto-money. With our competetive exchange rates, you can make your exchanges easily and profitable.
turkey_based_body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus nec dictum risus. Duis ligula orci, tincidunt ut massa et, vulputate rutrum felis. Morbi imperdiet quam nec metus fermentum
security_first_body: Nam ultricies eu libero at vestibulum.. Fusce et lorem mauris. Praesent vel urna et urna pellentesque vehicula vehicula id ligula..
instant_support_body: Etiam dapibus blandit sem eu laoreet. Nam ultricies eu libero at vestibulum. Suspendisse rhoncus at odio id mattis. Phasellus lacinia nisi elit, nec gravida nisi consectetur a.
reset_password_24h_warning: I acknowledge that my account will be locked for a minimum of 24 hours.
reset_password_24h_warning_error: You must acknowledge account lock condition.
password_reset_link_sent: Reset password email has been sent. follow the link in this email to set new password.
reset_password_success: Your password has been reset. You can login after 24 hours for security reasons.
login_account_inactive: Account e-mail verification is not complete.
login_too_many_requests: Too many attempts, please wait a while before retrying
login_account_ip_not_allowed: We have detected a new IP address for your account. Please check your e-mail and verify your IP address
login_ip_verify_success: IP address verification successful. You can now log in from this IP.
account_verify_success: Account Verification successful. You can now login.

account_deactivate.title: Deactivate Account
account_deactivate.warning: If you suspect that someone else as logged into your account, you can deactivate it until you contacted our support and secure your account.
account_deactivate.success: Your account is now deactivated. You can contact our support to secure your account and re-activate it

register_terms_of_service_error: You must agree the terms of service
register_success_message: Registration successful, please check your email for confirmation link.
register_error_message: Registration failed, please check form fields and try again.
two_fa_enter_ga_code: Please enter your Google Authenticator code
two_factor_auth_enabled_ga: Google Authenticator two factor authentication is enabled
two_factor_auth_enabled_sms: SMS two factor authentication is enabled
two_fa_setup_select_method: Please select two factor authentication method
two_fa_setup_ga_make_sure_saved: Make sure that you've saved the secret key or the QR image into a safe place. When you change your phone, you'll need one of them to be able to access your account. If you loose it, we won't be able to recover it!
two_fa_setup_ga_install_app: Install Google Authenticator app from App/Play store on your phone and scan the QR code or enter the secret key manually.
two_fa_setup_ga_enter_password: Then enter the password generated by the Google Authenticator to the box below and enable two factor authentication.
two_fa_setup_otp_sms_failed: We're unable to send your one time password. Please check your phone number and try again.
two_fa_setup_otp_sms_success: Your onetime password has been sent to your phone.
two_fa_setup_otp_sms_again: You can request a new code in 3 minutes.
two_fa_incorrect_code: Your one time password is incorrect
two_fa_incorrect_length: The length of your one time password is incorrect
two_fa_setup_cancel_message: Please enter your one time password to disable two factor authentication
mobile_phone_number_help: Please enter your mobile phone with country code. (ie: +15417543010)
sms_timeout_error: You must wait for a while to receive a new SMS code.
invalid_phone_number: Invalid phone number. Please enter your mobile phone with country code. (ie: +15417543010)
idv_message: In order to be able to deposit/withdraw money to/from your account, you need to verify your identity and address with official documents.
idv_message_waiting: Your identity verification is in process. We're working hard to complete your evaluation as soon as possible and will notify you via e-mail once its completed. Thanks for you patience.
idv_address_placeholder: Enter your full residence address including city state and country.
idv_selfie_photo_label: Your photo with your official id
idv_identity_helptext: Upload a clear and readable photo of your official idenetity's front and back sides. We do not accept PDF files, only upload image files.
idv_selfie_helptext: Upload a photo of your self when holding your identity -showing its front- and a paper written Exbita on it towards to camera. Make sure you're identity photo is not blocked and identity text is readable.
idv_address_helptext: Upload a photo of an official water,electricity etch bill which is registered on you for your residency address.  We do not accept PDF files, only image.
idv_files_invalid: Verification documents are invalid. Please only upload image files.
idv_upload_failed: Unable to save uploaded files on the server. Please try again.
idv_toast_rejected: Your identity documents have been evaluated and unfortunately your identity is not verified. Please check your documents and submit them again satisfying our format.
idv_toast_approved: Your identity documents have been evaluated and your account is now verified. You can access all features now!
file_upload_click_to_upload: Please select a file to upload. (Max Size: {max_size}, Recommended width/height: {max_resoltion})
file_upload_upload_failed: Unable to upload file, please try again later.
file_upload_max_size_warning: Size of the selected file is {file_size} and this exceeds the maximum allowed file size {max_size}. Please select a smaller file.

market.quick_buy_text: The amount you would like to exchange to {currency}?
market.quick_sell_text: How much {currency} you would like sell?
market.quick_buy_helptext:
The approximate amount of {cryptoSymbol} that can be bought by paying {amount} {quoteSymbol}, after commissions and taxes are excluded. This amount can vary according to the market ask prices.

Base value: {rawAmount} {quoteSymbol}
Commission: {commission} {quoteSymbol}
VAT: {tax} {quoteSymbol}
market.limit_buy_helptext:
Net amount of {quoteSymbol} will be spent from your wallet after your {cryptoSymbol} buy order has been fully completed. This amount includes the commission and tax.

Sales Amount: {rawAmount} {quoteSymbol}
Commission: {commission} {quoteSymbol}
VAT: {tax} {quoteSymbol}
Net Amount: {amount} {quoteSymbol}
market.quick_sell_helptext:
The approximate {quoteSymbol} amount you'll receive after your {cryptoSymboll} sell order has been fully completed. This amount may vary according to the market bid prices. Commission and tax deductions are also applied.

Sales Amount: {rawAmount} {quoteSymbol}
Commission: {commission} {quoteSymbol}
VAT: {tax} {quoteSymbol}
Net Amount: {amount} {quoteSymbol}
market.limit_sell_helptext:
Net {quoteSymbol} amount you'll receive after your {cryptoSymbol} sell order has been fully completed. Commission and tax deductions are also applied.

Sales Amount: {rawAmount} {quoteSymbol}
Commission: {commission} {quoteSymbol}
VAT: {tax} {quoteSymbol}
Net Amount: {amount} {quoteSymbol}
market.order_failed: Unable to place order. Please make sure you have enough balance
market.order_cancel_success: Your cancel request for order with id {uuid} has been submitted
market.order_cancel_fail: Your cancel request for order with id {uuid} has been failed
market.order_cancel_confirm: Are you sure to cancel your order: {uuid} ?
market.orders_cancel_confirm: Are you sure to cancel your orders?
market.approximate_no_bid_price: Unable to calculate approximate price since there are no bids for the market
market.approximate_no_ask_price: Unable to calculate approximate price since there are no asks for the market

order_book.title: Order Book
order_book.table_cancel_tooltip: You have {count} open orders at this price. Click to cancel them all.

token.empty_message: You have not created any personal access tokens
token.revoked_message: Your Personal Token is successfully revoked
token.success_message: Your Personal Token is successfully created
token.warning_message: Here is your new personal access token. This is the only time it will be shown so don't lose it! You may now use this token to make API requests.

deposit.tx_received: A new deposit of {amount} {symbol} is received to your {symbol} wallet with address {address}. It will be credited to your after a few blockchain confirmations.
deposit.tx_confirmed: {amount} {symbol} deposit is confirmed and credited to your {symbol} wallet with address {address}.

deposit_payment_waiting_for_approval: Payment Waiting for Approval. We'll approve it when you deposit it to bank account  above with the given description code.
deposit_code_provide: Provide this code in description when transfering money over the bank

deposit_address_generation.caution: Caution! When you generate a new address, you will no longer be able to deposit coins into current address. Depositing to current address will cause your funds to get lost. Do you want to continue?
deposit_address_generation.wallet_not_used: Your current address needs to have at least one deposit before generting a new one.
deposit_address_generation.failed: Address generation failed due to technical problems. Please try again later

deposit_fiat.toast_rejected: Your fiat deposit of {amount} {currency} with reference code {refcode} has been rejected.
deposit_fiat.toast_approved: Your fiat deposit of {amount} {currency} with reference code {refcode} has been approved.

withdraw.remember_this_bank_account: Do you want this account to get remembered for further withdrawals?
withdraw.remember_name_placeholder: Type a name for your account
withdraw.remember_this_address: Do you want this address to get remembered for further withdrawals
withdraw.remember_address_placeholder: Type a name for this address

new_home_page.header_description: Our cryptocurrency exchange script provides secure exchange, allowing customers to easily exchange Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin, Monero and many other cryptocurrencies with minimal slippage.
new_home_page.features_title: Secured Assets with YOUR EXCHANGE NAME
new_home_page.features_description: Your Asset is Secured with YOUR EXCHANGE NAME

features.feature1_description: Just send a message to our support team. Our support team is available 24/7.
features.feature2_description: All data transfers and connection are secured by using encrypted TLS connections
features.feature3_description: 100% of our users' funds are secured by 100% insurance coverage
features.feature4_description: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) is required for actions such as withdrawals or changes in account settings

register_form.email_sent_notice: A verification mail has already been sent, please wait some minutes before retrying
